desc: You can get additional rewards if you use Adv. Capsule Coins during the event: "Girls X Capsule Points". The event will be updated in the future, please stay tuned!
You can get additional rewards if you use Seals during the event: "Enroll Exam". The event will be updated in the future, please stay tuned!
You can get additional rewards if you use Slot Tickets during the event: "Slot Points". The event will be updated in the future, please stay tuned!
